text: Polyommatinae, the blues, are a diverse subfamily of gossamer-winged butterflies (family Lycaenidae). This subfamily was long used to assign taxa of unclear relationships, and its contents and phylogeny are still in need of revision. The following four tribes are generally recognized within Polyommatinae,Tolweb with Polyommatini comprising most of the genera and species: * Candalidini Eliot 1973 * Lycaenesthini Toxopeus 1929 * Niphandini Eliot 1973 * Polyommatini Swainson 1827 ==References== ==External links== * * Tolweb. * Butterflies and Moths of North America * Butterflies of America Category:Taxa named by William John Swainson Category:Butterfly subfamilies
title: Polyommatinae
